title: Chicken and Chrysanthemum Stir Fry
ingredients: ['950g chicken meat, thinly sliced', '3 egg whites', 'salt, to taste', 'shaoxing wine, to taste', 'ground white pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour', 'salt, to taste', 'sugar, to taste', 'monosodium glutamate (MSG), to taste', 'ground white pepper, to taste', 'sesame oil, to taste', '1 teaspoon cornflour', 'water, as needed', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon finely chopped spring onions', '40g dried chrysanthemum petals, rinseed and drained']
